title: Fun radio!
brief_description: A casual glance at the Australian summer weekend. A troupe of pop singers is greeted at the airport by a large crowd. In the suburbs people are seen at their homes. Life in Melbourne is seen as a great religious festival, complete with rituals, taboos and minor deities.
